question:
You ordered an item from an online shopping store and it has arrived damaged. Write a letter to the retailer to complain. In your letter: 
• Explain why you are unhappy 
• Request a refund 
• Make arrangements to return the damaged item
text: I am writing this letter to express my dissatisfaction with the product which I ordered online from your store.

When I placed the order, I was very delighted. However, when I got the parcel, containing a mobile phone, I became very annoyed as its screen was damaged. Due to this reason, I am unhappy with your services.

I did not expect that I will receive a phone with a broken display. As I make full payment in advance through my credit card at the time of purchase. Therefore, I want you to please start the process of the refund at the earliest.
In addition to it, I also want you to appoint a member of your staff who can collect the damaged item from my home by the end of this week. It would be really helpful for me.
Looking forward to hearing from your side.
